content.description: Start sitting on the left side of the small roof on trail side of boulder. Match hands at base of inobvious pinch feature, high-step right foot to small crimp, use a very sharp crimp and a spike feature, and climb to top of boulder.
content.location: Left side of roof, #3 on the beta photo.

content.description: Start sitting very low below the right hand slopey arete on the trail side of the boulder. With left hand on a small crimp (really a foothold under the roof) and right hand pinching the arete, pull on and put a right heel on the arete. Climb the arete to the top without using any holds way to the right.
content.location: Right side of overhang.  #1 on the beta photo.

content.description: Start sitting in the middle of the roof with left hand left of mini arÃªte (on starting hold of 30 days notice) on crimp pinch and right hand sidepulling big arete. Pull on, hook right heel and then work hands up using the slopey arete for your right and crimps/features on the left to top of boulder.
content.location: Middle of roof, #2 on the beta photo.

content.description: Along the trail from the Summit on the left, obvious overhang right on the trail.
